```{r}
# Access to ggplot2, GGally,tidyr and enz.
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
library(tidyr)

enz<-read.table("~/Desktop/IODS-project/IODS-Final/Data/enzymes.txt", sep="", header=T)
head(enz)
#  Plot with ggplot (aes)
p1 <- ggplot(enz, aes(x = c(2:18), y = (value)))

#  point visualization
p2 <- p1 + geom_bar()

# adding a regression line
p3 <- p2 + geom_smooth(method = "lm")

# adding a title and drawing the plot
p4 <- p3 + ggtitle("Student's attitude vs exam points")

# printing the plot
p4
```
